lead_paragraph: U.S. women's water polo coach Adam Krikorian met with his team before practice on Thursday morning. One of his two older brothers had died, and he was leaving to spend time with his family.

headline.print_headline: US Women's Water Polo Coach Leaves Team After Brother Dies
headline.main: US Women's Water Polo Coach Leaves Team After Brother Dies

snippet: U.S. women's water polo coach Adam Krikorian met with his team before practice on Thursday morning. One of his two older brothers had died, and he was leaving to spend time with his family....
